b168549e36ed.title: Just when you thought the justification for border security couldn’t get any more ridiculous…

paragraphs.name: a18c
paragraphs.text: Just when you thought the justification for border security couldn’t get any more ridiculous…
But OK, I’ll play.

paragraphs.name: 0f79
paragraphs.text: First, what makes Rep. Franks think that border agents have no problem with bales of marijuana coming into the country?

virtuals.subtitle: “ Franks has made salacious claims about the porosity of the southern U.S. border before. In 2014, he said that the militant group ISIS had…

paragraphs.text: I was with you until you got to “salacious.”

paragraphs.name: 5e9e
paragraphs.text: “ Franks has made salacious claims about the porosity of the southern U.S. border before. In 2014, he said that the militant group ISIS had operations running in Ciudad Juarez, a claim that a senior U.S. law enforcement officialsaid had no basis in reality.”

paragraphs.text: Since obviously a lot of pot makes it over the border, the impression Esther Yu Hsi Lee is trying to give is itself dubious. Also, the components for a nuke wouldn’t all be as large as a person.

paragraphs.name: 3c4f
paragraphs.text: Maybe a fold-up nuke would fit inside a bale of mj? What good would a wall be if the people wanting in had a nuclear bomb? It would probably be easier to smuggle nukes in than the bales of mj. Not sure if the dogs are trained to sniff out nukes or not. Too many problems with this scenario.

618bde4d65e1.title: Nuclear warheads can be considerably smaller than ‘a person’.

paragraphs.name: 2b5a
paragraphs.text: Nuclear warheads can be considerably smaller than ‘a person’. The smallest known categories which were developed were the 250 ton TNT equivalent ‘Davy Crockett’ 280mm mortar-style warhead weighing around 50 lbs, which was fired from a recoilless rifle;

paragraphs.text: Thank you Congressman Franks. This is why we must legalize marijuana across the U.S. at all costs — to lock out the Mexican cartels so that they can’t ship nuclear bombs packed in marijuana bales over the border.

afb9297f1f31.title: “Just look at popular conservative politicians and how they get in your head.

paragraphs.text: “Just look at popular conservative politicians and how they get in your head. They look for people who scare easily and don’t have a way to check for lies. Then they try to scare you about something imaginary and offer themselves as the solution. Like a snake oil salesman that makes up your malady, then sells you a cure that you never needed.”
